p: In search for novel antifungal compounds, 368 and 369 were tested against C. neoformans and C. gattii. Compounds 368 and 369 exhibited moderate antifungal activities against Cryptococcus neoformans and Cryptococcus gattii, each with minimum inhibitory concentration values of 50.0 μg/mL and 250.0 μg/mL, respectively [ 120].
